languages.text: "Если бы мы могли бросить им кость, позволить найти желанные ими улики, потерю которых мы переживем... Остальное можно было бы скрыть от пытливых взглядов. Подобно песчаной ящерице, сбросившей хвост, пожертвовать малым, дабы сохранить великое".

"If only we could throw them a bone, and let them find the evidence they want, one that we can get by without... The rest could be concealed away from their inquisitive eyes. Like a sand lizard shedding its tail, sometimes one must cede the battle to win the war."
languages.original_text: "Если бы мы могли бросить им кость, позволить найти желанные ими улики, потерю которых мы переживем... Остальное можно было бы скрыть от пытливых взглядов. Подобно песчаной ящерице, сбросившей хвост, пожертвовать малым, дабы сохранить великое".

traits.locale_text: "If only we could throw them a bone, and let them find the evidence they want, the one that we can get by without... The rest could be concealed away from the inquisitive glances. Like a sand lizard shedding its tail, one can sacrifice a little in order to save a lot."

"If only we could throw them a bone, and let them find the evidence they want, the one that we can get by without... The rest could be concealed away from the inquisitive glances. Like a sand lizard shedding its tail, one can sacrifice a little in order to save a lot."

"If only we could throw them a bone, and let them find the evidence they want, one that we can get by without... The rest could be concealed away from their inquisitive eyes. Like a sand lizard shedding its tail, sometimes one must cede the battle to win the war."

"If only we could throw them a bone, and let them find the evidence they want, one that we can get by without... The rest could be concealed away from their inquisitive eyes. Like a sand lizard shedding its tail, sometimes one must cede the battle to win the war."

"If only we could throw them a bone, and let them find the evidence they want, one that we can get by without... The rest could be concealed away from their inquisitive eyes. Like a sand lizard shedding its tail, sometimes one must cede the battle to win the war."

languages.text: “我们可以给他们点甜头，让他们找到想要的证据，抓住一些无关紧要的东西……我们可以借着这个机会把别的东西藏起来，避开窥探的目光，就像沙蜥主动断掉尾巴一样。我们可以做出些许牺牲，来避免更多的麻烦。”
languages.original_text: "If only we could throw them a bone, and let them find the evidence they want, one that we can get by without... The rest could be concealed away from their inquisitive eyes. Like a sand lizard shedding its tail, sometimes one must cede the battle to win the war."

traits.locale_text: “我们可以给他们点甜头，让他们找到想要的证据，抓住一些无关紧要的东西……我们可以借着这个机会把别的东西藏起来，避开窥探的目光，就像沙蜥主动断掉尾巴一样。我们可以做出些许牺牲，来避免更多的麻烦。”

languages.text: «Si tan solo pudiéramos tirarles un hueso, y dejarles encontrar la evidencia que quieren, una de la que podamos prescindir... El resto podría ocultarse lejos de sus ojos inquisitivos. Como un lagarto de arena que se desprende de su cola, a veces hay que ceder la batalla para ganar la guerra».
languages.original_text: "If only we could throw them a bone, and let them find the evidence they want, one that we can get by without... The rest could be concealed away from their inquisitive eyes. Like a sand lizard shedding its tail, sometimes one must cede the battle to win the war."

traits.locale_text: «Si tan solo pudiéramos tirarles un hueso, y dejarles encontrar la evidencia que quieren, una de la que podamos prescindir... El resto podría ocultarse lejos de sus ojos inquisitivos. Como un lagarto de arena que se desprende de su cola, a veces hay que ceder la batalla para ganar la guerra».

languages.text: 「奴らを援助し、奴らが望む証拠を見つけさせてやれたら、それは当然、我々が使わなくても乗り切れるもので...すると、残りはは奴らの詮索好きな目から隠すことができるだろう。戦争に勝つためには、砂トカゲが尻尾を切り捨てるみたいに、時には戦いを放棄しなければならないのだ」
languages.original_text: "If only we could throw them a bone, and let them find the evidence they want, one that we can get by without... The rest could be concealed away from their inquisitive eyes. Like a sand lizard shedding its tail, sometimes one must cede the battle to win the war."

traits.locale_text: 「奴らを援助し、奴らが望む証拠を見つけさせてやれたら、それは当然、我々が使わなくても乗り切れるもので...すると、残りはは奴らの詮索好きな目から隠すことができるだろう。戦争に勝つためには、砂トカゲが尻尾を切り捨てるみたいに、時には戦いを放棄しなければならないのだ」

languages.text: « Si seulement nous pouvions leur donner un os à ronger, quelque chose qui ne nous manquerait pas et qui leur permettrait de trouver les preuves qu'ils cherchent... Ainsi, nous pourrions cacher tout le reste à leurs regards inquisiteurs. Pour gagner la guerre, il faut parfois concéder une bataille... comme le lézard des sables sacrifiant sa queue. »
languages.original_text: "If only we could throw them a bone, and let them find the evidence they want, one that we can get by without... The rest could be concealed away from their inquisitive eyes. Like a sand lizard shedding its tail, sometimes one must cede the battle to win the war."

traits.locale_text: « Si seulement nous pouvions leur donner un os à ronger, quelque chose qui ne nous manquerait pas et qui leur permettrait de trouver les preuves qu'ils cherchent... Ainsi, nous pourrions cacher tout le reste à leurs regards inquisiteurs. Pour gagner la guerre, il faut parfois concéder une bataille... comme le lézard des sables sacrifiant sa queue. »

languages.text: "Wenn wir ihnen doch nur einen kleinen Knochen zuwerfen könnten. Sie die Beweise finden lassen, die sie haben wollen. Welche, auf die wir verzichten können ... Der Rest ließe sich vor ihren neugierigen Augen verbergen. Wie eine Sandechse, die ihren Schwanz abwirft, muss man manchmal die Schlacht abgeben, um den Krieg zu gewinnen."
languages.original_text: "If only we could throw them a bone, and let them find the evidence they want, one that we can get by without... The rest could be concealed away from their inquisitive eyes. Like a sand lizard shedding its tail, sometimes one must cede the battle to win the war."

traits.locale_text: "Wenn wir ihnen doch nur einen kleinen Knochen zuwerfen könnten. Sie die Beweise finden lassen, die sie haben wollen. Welche, auf die wir verzichten können ... Der Rest ließe sich vor ihren neugierigen Augen verbergen. Wie eine Sandechse, die ihren Schwanz abwirft, muss man manchmal die Schlacht abgeben, um den Krieg zu gewinnen."

languages.text: "Ağızlarına bir parmak bal çalıp istedikleri delili bulmalarını sağlasak, öyle bir delil olsa ki onsuz da başımızın çaresine bakabilsek... Gerisini de engizisyoncu gözlerinden gizleyebiliriz. Tıpkı kuyruğunu atan kum kertenkelesi gibi bazen savaşı kazanmak için çatışmadan feragat etmek gerekir."
languages.original_text: "If only we could throw them a bone, and let them find the evidence they want, one that we can get by without... The rest could be concealed away from their inquisitive eyes. Like a sand lizard shedding its tail, sometimes one must cede the battle to win the war."
